awd_titl_txt: AIHEC Attendance at AISES Conference, Washington, D.C.,     November 1992
awd_abstract_narration: This project supports eighteen faculty members from Tribal                 Colleges which are members of the American Indian Higher Education              Consortium (AIHEC) to attend the 1992 American Indian Science and               Engineering Society (AISES) Conference in Washington, DC, November              5-8, 1992.  This is an extremely worthwhile activity and serves to              supplement the program CISE supports to bring faculty, from the                 more general category of minority institutions, to computer related             conferences.  The AISES conferences addresses a much broader range              of issues relating to science and engineering education at these                institutions which serve a primarily Native American population.                It is critical that faculty at minority institutions attend                     national conferences of this type in order to become better                     integrated into the research and education communities.  This                   project represents a strong effort in that direction.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering
